mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS Committed into the Prison of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 4th instant, a griffe, calling himself LEWIS, and saying he belongs to Mrs. Sarah Eveline Vernon, residing on Bayou BÅ“uf, in the Parish of Avoyelles, where he absconded on the 31st of last month. This boy is if a griff color, 5 feet, 7 inches high, stout built, aged about 30 years. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, February 11th, 1854.
